\# About This Portfolio

Welcome to my IS415 Geospatial Analytics and Applications portfolio! This Quarto page showcases my journey and projects in the field of geospatial analytics.

## What You'll Find Here

-   **Course Projects**: A collection of hands-on projects completed during the IS415 course.
-   **Technical Skills:** Demonstrations of various geospatial analysis techniques and tools.
-   **Personal Insights**: My reflections on learning geospatial analytics and its applications.

I hope this portfolio provides insight into my growth and capabilities in geospatial analytics. Feel free to explore the projects and reach out if you have any questions!
